desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ

dictionary.lore: This treasure that heightens one's life-force and spirit is said to have been revered as an incarnation of the gods in a village from another world. However, a knight who saw the reverence of an otherworldly god as blasphemous destroyed the temple it was housed in, and offered the treasure to the La Veda Republic. After this incident there are no records stating that the pearl was ever moved, but later on when the last commander of the knights opened the safe it was kept in, the pearl is said to have been missing.

name: ヴィハラの紫金珠
